thread.title: CHS Products Innovative Memory Foam Travel Pillow Now Available
thread.title_full: CHS Products Innovative Memory Foam Travel Pillow Now Available

author: prbuzz.com
title: CHS Products Innovative Memory Foam Travel Pillow Now Available
text:
July 8, 2015 - Lisbon, WI -- LeisureTime Pro Memory Foam Travel Pillow Now Available For 60% Off Retail Price.
Memory Foam Technology Plus Money Back Guarantee Attracts Buyers.
Finding great value can sometimes be a challenge when so many poor quality look-alike products are available. However, the LeisureTime Pro Memory Foam Travel Pillow delivers high quality at nearly half the price of expensive imitations.
"It's not necessary to pay premium dollars for an exceptional product" says Chuck Schuele, founder and CEO of CHS Products LLC. He goes on to say "Providing quality products at affordable prices is the cornerstone of our company philosophy. That commitment, along with delivering superior customer service provides the best buying experience one could ever expect."
CHS Products LLC offers a 1 year money back guarantee, plus a lifetime replacement warranty, a testament to the company's business philosophy. This guarantee is attractive to customers who have been burned in the past by inferior products that that had to be pushed to the back of the closet or even discarded.
The LeisureTime Pro Travel Pillow is made from premium memory foam which provides custom molded support for the head and neck. It also comes with a removable cover for ease of cleaning. This pillow is for use during travels by Plane, Train, Bus or Car and can also be used at home while reading or watching TV.
Available exclusively through Amazon.com, the LeisureTime Pro Memory Foam Travel Pillow is being offered at a 60% introductory discount price for a limited time. Consumers have an opportunity to take advantage of these extra savings while current supplies last.
About CHS Products LLC
CHS Products LLC provides high quality every day items for the home , kitchen and garden.
